snippet: The Phelan Brothers, owners of Taconic Farms, which breeds rodents for lab use, created a holding company as a way to maintain some family control over the business.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters describes how Samuel Phelan and his two brothers, owners of genetically modified rat breeding company Taconic Farms, have created a holding company as way to maintain some family control over the business.
lead_paragraph: The Phelan Brothers, owners of Taconic Farms, which breeds rodents for lab use, created a holding company as a way to maintain some family control over the business.

headline.print_headline: Modern Safeguards for a Family-Owned Business
headline.seo: Modern Safeguards for a Family-Owned Business
headline.main: Modern Safeguards for a Family-Owned Business
